item.title: Hear Hear
item.description: New Beginnings This is the first post. I’m sure you’ve come across these before. But that doesn’t mean it’s simply a placeholder. On the contrary, I take first posts rather seriously. For me, this piece is a harbinger to the forthcoming good stuff. The question is what will I publish here? Honestly, I don’t have a specific answer. Most likely, this personal blog will be home to everything that comes to my mind which I won’t be able to pitch to other publications.
item.content:
New Beginnings

This is the first post. I’m sure you’ve come across these before.

But that doesn’t mean it’s simply a placeholder. On the contrary, I take first posts rather seriously.

For me, this piece is a harbinger to the forthcoming good stuff. The question is what will I publish here?

Honestly, I don’t have a specific answer. Most likely, this personal blog will be home to everything that comes to my mind which I won’t be able to pitch to other publications. Be it pop-culture discussions, fiction stories I occasionally pen down, bigger philosophical thoughts, travel stories, extensions to my Twitter rants, the works.

It won’t be that often, however. I will try to post at least a few times every month.

So let’s get started.
